sentences.sContent: “Technology does not need to estrange us from one another,” Cox said. “The physical reality comes alive with the human stories we have told there.”
sentences.sContent_eng: “Technology does not need to estrange us from one another,” Cox said. “The physical reality comes alive with the human stories we have told there.”
sentences.sCn: “技术不会使我们彼此疏离，”考克斯说道，“当我们来到那些有故事的地点时，现实也就活灵活现了。”

remMethod.val: e (看作en， 使…) + strange (陌生的) → 使得陌生 → 疏远

words.tran: 使疏远；使隔离；使离间（estrange的过去分词）
